name: bullet-pattern-generator
description: This is a recreation in TS of the bullet trajectory module I had created as a part in my A Level NEA, with newly added and experimental patterns and modes to extend what I had in my 2D shooter game - originally (and admittedly still) inspired by the likes of Touhou Project and Undertale. I had decided to rework this specific aspect of the NEA due to seeing Christ Church at Oxford University's "Can computers be used to create art?" challenge.
